title: LF Strong MID Laner 5's rank team
body: we have 4 players atm they are all dedicated and friendly. we have two gold and two silver in our team. We want gold or higher level of Mid laner since its the important position , we will play in tournament in 5th or April.  If you are interested to join please write your username and main three champs you use so we can think of team strategy for the games

replies.body:
